page.title: 04Richard Horsley Aged 7
page.content: My name is Richard Horsley.I live at Frenches farm,Barnardiston,Suffolk and my father's family have been farmers here for about a hundred years. I have one brother,Peter,who goes to the Perse School for Boys in Cambridge. I go to Barnardiston Hall school and my teacher's name is Miss Miller.I love running and swimming,playing "Diamond Hunt board game and watching Dungeons and Dragons on television.At school I like doing Maths.,and playing with Plasticene.My favourite shhool lunch is fish and I like salad too,but i hate tapioca which we call "frogspawn".My school,MY house and my farm are all in the same "Domesday"square.
